extendedInfo.description: How much charge is left in your battery?   Where is all the power going?Power Check app reports battery charge, temperature, status, and health.A second screen shows which components (GPS, phone, screen etc) are using the power.This app says whether a recharge is needed - unneeded recharges destroy batteries!

reviews.title: Perfect, displays the exact battery info you need
reviews.comment: A very straight forward app to quickly and easily display all the information you need to monitor what\'s going on with your battery - so you\'ll be able to make it last longer and reduce your frequency of recharges that you know ultimately kills your batteries life.
reviews.author: Dan Hitchens

reviews.title: does an excellent job of showing battery info
reviews.comment: This app tells details information about the status of the battery and how much power each app is using. The interface is simple to read and to understand.  Very useful utility!
reviews.author: Andy Tai

reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
reviews.comment: I was suspicious that the battery indicator on my home screen didn\'t accurately reflect the state of my battery. So i went hunting for something better. This app shows me exactly what i wanted to know. Also press the \" Used By\" button to see a list of the apps draining your battery.
reviews.author: Keithen Hayenga

reviews.title: Battery Check
reviews.comment: App is well done, accurate and tells me what I need to know.
reviews.author: Lalitha Krishnamurthy

reviews.comment: Seems to work just fine. Does what it\'s supposed to.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Even with a RAZR MAXX, you need to keep tabs on your battery
reviews.comment: Cool how you can watch the temperature go up as LTE eats your battery. This app really helps you see that.
reviews.author: Brent Gossett
